purpose: To provide a framework for building autonomous agents that can interact with digital environments.
principle: Leverages modular components and a plugin architecture to enable flexible and scalable agent development.
reusability: Highly modular with a plugin architecture, allowing for easy integration and extension through custom modules.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues and incomplete features, limited documentation.
name: pippin
description: The Digital Being Framework for Autonomous Agents
highlight: A comprehensive framework for developing autonomous digital beings with a focus on modularity and extensibility.
